name: Mr. Peppero Makes a Pizza
description:
A puzzle-platformer made for GMTK Game Jam 2021!

The pizzeria is open, but someone left a mess in the kitchen! Play as Mr. Peppero and join together with other ingredients to finish the pizza at the end of the stage - but be careful to beat the timer, and finish with the ingredient the pizza requests. Complete all the levels with the best time possible, and there might even be a surprise for you at the end!

CREDITS:

Final Animations & Tilesets: Silver Sonome
